operator.title: IsTrue
operator.synopsis: This is the IsTrue Operator, which is used to check if a condition is true or false.

text.paragraph: This IsTrue Operator receive the step object from its parent operator through input Model Port, add the check condition to the step model, and return two new routes which indicates the True or False of its condition.
This Operator gets the current step model from the input Pack, create a new Condition Node with its data input, connect itself with its parent, and add this new node to the step's nodes list.
Important: this operator is building the step model, without any calculation or training, no results or data will be generated.

inputPorts.port: The input Pack object, which contains the current step model, the parent where this Pack was generated, and the route indicator[Yes, No] from the parent.
Receives a String object, containing the subject of the check condition.

outputPorts.port: Outputs a Pack object, which contains the current step model with the new Condition Node added, the parent is set to this new node, and the route indicator is set to Yes.
Outputs a Pack object, which contains the current step model with the new Condition Node added, the parent is set to this new node, and the route indicator is set to No.

parameters.parameter: Select the name of the focused lead here, e.g. "II". (Doing this will add a lead tag to the input string of data.)
